description: Retrieves the delivery destination policy assigned to the delivery destination that you specify. For more information about delivery destinations and their policies, see PutDeliveryDestinationPolicy.

parameters.name: deliveryDestinationName
parameters.description: The name of the delivery destination that you want to retrieve the policy of.

nested_items.name: deliveryDestinationPolicy
nested_items.description: The contents of the delivery destination policy.
